src/lib/components/_DashPdf.react.js.description: _DashPdf is a component that renders a PDF with annotation capabilities.

data.description: PDF data source - can be a URL string, ArrayBuffer, or Uint8Array

setProps.description: Callback function to update component props (used by Dash framework)

scale.description: Zoom scale factor for the PDF display (default: 1.0)

page_number.description: Current page number to display (1-based indexing)

num_pages.description: Total number of pages in the PDF document

annotations.description: Array of annotation objects containing position, type, and content data

selected_annotation.description: ID of the currently selected annotation

onAnnotationAdd.description: Callback fired when a new annotation is added

onAnnotationDelete.description: Callback fired when an annotation is deleted

onAnnotationUpdate.description: Callback fired when an annotation is updated/modified

enable_pan.description: Whether pan functionality is enabled (default: true)

enable_zoom.description: Whether zoom functionality is enabled (default: true)
